comment: Should we mash at 150 for 45min then ramp up to 170 for 15min and sparge at 175? OR should we mash at 158 for 45 min and then sparge at 175? OR should we mash at 152 for 60min then sparge at 168?
BREW DAY NOTES- Actual mash temp target 148-152.  Strike around 163 of 4 gallons. Sparge at 168.  Using 2 packs of Gigayeast.
